Translations.Text: Ni shuo:“Wo zhishi yige jinggao zhe. Chu du yi zhizun de zhenzhu wai, jue wu ying shou chongbai de
Ta shi tiandi wanwu de zhu, ta shi wanneng de, zhi she de.”
Ni shuo:“Na shi yige zhongda de xiaoxi
nimen que liqi ta
Dang shang jie de zhong tianshen zhenglun de shihou, wo bu zhidao tamen de qingxing
Wo zhi feng dao qishi shuo,“wo shi yige tanshuai de jinggao zhe.”
Dangshi, ni de zhu ceng dui zhong tianshen shuo:“Wo biding yao yong ni chuangzao yige ren
dang wo ba ta zao chulai, bing jiang wo de jingshen chui ru ta de tinei de shihou, nimen dang wei ta er dao shen koutou.”
Zhong tianshen quanti yitong koutou
wei yi bo lie si zi da, ta yuan shi buxindao zhe
Zhu shuo:“Yi bo lie si a! Ni zenme bu ken dui wo qinshou zao de ren koutou ne? Ni zi da ne? Haishi ni ben shi gaoshang de ne?”
Ta shuo:“Wo bi ta gaogui; ni yong huo zao wo, yong ni zao ta.”
Zhu shuo:“Ni cong leyuan zhong chuqu ba! Ni que shi bei fangzhu de
ni bi zao wo de qi jue, zhidao baoying ri.”
Ta shuo:“Wo de zhu a! Qiu ni kuandai wo dao renlei fuhuo zhi ri.”
Zhu shuo:“Ni biding bei kuandai
zhidao fuhuo shi lailin zhi ri.”
Ta shuo:“Yi ni de zun rong fashi, wo bi jiang tamen quanti jiayi youhuo
wei bu youhuo ni de chunjie de puren.”
Ta shuo:“Wo dehua que shi zhenli, wo zhi shuo zhenli
wo bi yi ni he renlei zhong shuncong ni de, tong qi chongman huo yu.”
Ni shuo:“Wo bu wei chuanda shiming er xiang nimen suoqu renhe baochou, wo bushi zaoyao de
Zhe zhishi dui quan shijie de jiaohui
zai yige shiqi zhihou, nimen biding zhidao guanyu zhe jiaohui de xiaoxi.”
